entry.string:
This item is currently on backorder.
Order it now and we will send it to you
when it comes in.
entry.translation:
Thees item is coorrently oon beckurder. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!
Order it noo und ve-a veell send it tu yuoo
vhee it cumes in. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: This item has been discontinued and cannot be bought.
entry.translation: Thees item hes beee deescuntinooed und cunnut be-a buooght. Um de hur de hur de hur.
